languages.text: {n}На мгновение взгляд Абеляра становится пустым, будто обращенным внутрь себя. Затем он пару раз моргает и удивленно произносит:{/n} "Хмм. Нет. Определенно нет. Ничего такого не припомню".

{n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. No, I don't recall anything like that."
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение взгляд Абеляра становится пустым, будто обращенным внутрь себя. Затем он пару раз моргает и удивленно произносит:{/n} "Хмм. Нет. Определенно нет. Ничего такого не припомню".

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. I don't recall anything like that."

{n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. I don't recall anything like that."

{n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. I don't recall anything like that."

{n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. I don't recall anything like that."

languages.text: {n}Abelard pone una expresión vacía durante un instante, como si se hubiese enfrascado en sus propios pensamientos. Luego parpadea dos veces y habla con tono de sorpresa:{/n} «Hum. No. Definitivamente no. No, no recuerdo nada parecido».
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. No, I don't recall anything like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard pone una expresión vacía durante un instante, como si se hubiese enfrascado en sus propios pensamientos. Luego parpadea dos veces y habla con tono de sorpresa:{/n} «Hum. No. Definitivamente no. No, no recuerdo nada parecido».

languages.text: {n}一瞬、アベラルドは意識を内側に向けたかのようにぼんやりとした。その後、彼は二度まばたきをして、驚いた声で言った。{/n}「いいえ。まったく心当たりがありませんな」
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. No, I don't recall anything like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、アベラルドは意識を内側に向けたかのようにぼんやりとした。その後、彼は二度まばたきをして、驚いた声で言った。{/n}「いいえ。まったく心当たりがありませんな」

languages.text: {n}有那么一瞬间，阿贝拉德的眼神无比茫然，仿佛注意力都跑到脑海中了。他眨了两次眼睛，以惊讶的声音开了口。{/n}“呃……没有，一点都没有。我对这些词没有任何印象。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. No, I don't recall anything like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}有内么一瞬间，阿贝拉德的眼神无比茫然，仿佛注意力都跑到脑海中了。他眨了两次眼睛，以惊讶的声音开了口。{/n}“呃……没有，一点都没有。我对这些词没有任何印象。”
{n}有那么一瞬间，阿贝拉德的眼神无比茫然，仿佛注意力都跑到脑海中了。他眨了两次眼睛，以惊讶的声音开了口。{/n}“呃……没有，一点都没有。我对这些词没有任何印象。”

languages.text: {n}Abélard affiche quelques instants un regard vide, comme s'il avait tourné toute son attention en lui-même, puis il cligne deux fois des yeux et déclare d'un air surpris :{/n} « Hmm... Non, absolument pas. Non, je ne me souviens de rien de tel. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. No, I don't recall anything like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard affiche quelques instants un regard vide, comme s'il avait tourné toute son attention en lui-même, puis il cligne deux fois des yeux et déclare d'un air surpris :{/n} « Hmm... Non, absolument pas. Non, je ne me souviens de rien de tel. »

languages.text: {n}Abelards Blick wird vorübergehend trübe, als hätte sich seine Aufmerksamkeit ganz nach innen gerichtet. Dann blinzelt er zweimal und sagt überrascht:{/n} "Hmm. Nein. Definitiv nicht. Nein, ich erinnere mich nicht an dergleichen."
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. No, I don't recall anything like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Blick wird vorübergehend trübe, als hätte sich seine Aufmerksamkeit ganz nach innen gerichtet. Dann blinzelt er zweimal und sagt überrascht:{/n} "Hmm. Nein. Definitiv nicht. Ich erinnere mich nicht an dergleichen."

{n}Abelards Blick wird vorübergehend trübe, als hätte sich seine Aufmerksamkeit ganz nach innen gerichtet. Dann blinzelt er zweimal und sagt überrascht:{/n} "Hmm. Nein. Definitiv nicht. Ich erinnere mich nicht an dergleichen."

languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. I don't recall anything like that."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, tüm dikkatini kendi içine odaklamış gibi bir anlığına dalıyor. Ardından iki kez göz kırpıp şaşkınlıkla yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Hımm. Hayır, hiçbir şey ifade etmiyor. İlk defa duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment, Abelard's eyes go blank, as if he has turned his attention inward. Then he blinks twice and says in a tone of surprise,{/n} "Hmm. No. Definitely not. No, I don't recall anything like that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, tüm dikkatini zihnine odaklamış gibi bir anlığına dalıyor. Ardından iki kez göz kırpıp şaşkınlıkla yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Hımm. Hayır, hiçbir şey ifade etmiyor. İlk defa duyuyorum."
